seeds.mechanism: a person or human-like presence appears in the narrator’s life or records that no one else recognizes
seeds.escalation: the presence becomes more involved, closer, or more aware of the narrator
seeds.consequence: the narrator suspects the presence is replacing or erasing them
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the presence may not be human, but behaves as if it is learning how to be one

seeds.mechanism: photos, videos, or records reveal an impossible figure, shape, or shadow that was never there
seeds.escalation: the anomaly appears more frequently and in newer, more personal records
seeds.consequence: the narrator believes something is entering reality through the records
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the figure may be an entity that can only appear indirectly

seeds.mechanism: a disturbing presence or phenomenon affects the narrator, then begins appearing around someone dependent on them
seeds.escalation: the second person shows signs of being noticed or followed
seeds.consequence: the narrator realizes the presence spreads through proximity or care
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the presence behaves like a parasitic or predatory intelligence

seeds.mechanism: something unseen occupies the narrator’s most private or protected space
seeds.escalation: physical signs suggest awareness of being observed
seeds.consequence: the narrator avoids being alone or sleeping normally
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the presence may exist only when unobserved

seeds.mechanism: a subtle rule governs a place, object, or behavior
seeds.escalation: each violation triggers a more severe reaction
seeds.consequence: the narrator realizes the rule is enforced by something watching
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the enforcement may come from an unseen entity tied to the environment

seeds.mechanism: the narrator remembers a person or event that no longer exists in reality
seeds.consequence: the narrator wonders if something altered reality or their mind
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the discrepancy may be caused by a non-human intelligence altering perception

seeds.mechanism: a shape, sound, or presence is always nearby but never fully visible
seeds.escalation: the distance between it and the narrator steadily decreases
seeds.consequence: the narrator restructures their life to avoid confined or dark spaces
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the presence may be hunting or approaching without physical form

seeds.mechanism: acknowledging or observing the phenomenon makes it stronger
seeds.escalation: attempts to ignore it fail and increase its activity
seeds.consequence: the narrator becomes hyper-aware of their own thoughts and reactions
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the phenomenon may be sentient and responsive to awareness

seeds.mechanism: a location reacts as if it remembers the narrator’s past actions
seeds.consequence: the narrator avoids places that feel aware of them
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the environment may be influenced by an inhabiting presence

seeds.mechanism: a brief encounter with something unnatural seems harmless at first
seeds.escalation: effects appear later in unrelated places or times
seeds.consequence: the narrator realizes the encounter marked them
seeds.supernatural_allowance: the entity may have attached itself without immediate effect
